tag: LOCK: This record is locked. See Details.
policy: This tag is only to be placed on records that have been locked due to a severe code violation, non-payment, or similar critical problems.
This tag can be used generally for any alert that does not fit a standard tag.
This tag should be added to records that are associated with a Use Permit issued by Planning.
Add to records associated with a safety or health risk. Always add notes about the risk.
Add to records for property that is owned and/or operated by the County of Yolo.
Add to records that have a balance due that must be paid.
Add to records that require flood review.

tag: ALERT: (TCO) Temporary Certificate of Occupancy. See Notes.
policy: Add to records that are associated with a TCO. Set an appropriate expiration date.
Add to records within a wildland-urban interface area.
